title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 421.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 421.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) For purposes of this Part, unless otherwise stated herein, terms shall have the
same meaning as set forth in section 601 of New York State Education

Law. (b) "Financial Aid Award

Information Sheet" means standard financial aid award letter required by
section
9-w
of the Banking

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
421.2

Adopted

New

York State Register November 23, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 47, eff. 11/23/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
